A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Episode VIII takes us on a journey we haven't been on yet. Johnson took the same risk Taika Waititi took in directing Thor: Ragnarok\, and we all know the masterpiece that turned out to be. The Last Jedi took all of your expectations and shoved them back in your face\, delivering fresh material and unpredictable emotional twists. I saw it twice in one day and can't wait to go again\, and it will be a miserable two years until we wrap up this amazing story in Episode IX\, but TLJ will keep me busy until then\, and I'm going to fall in love with it more every time I see it.
